Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the creation of an annual report on the race and ethnic data of individuals who have taken a civil service examination
Summary: Relates to the creation of an annual report on the race and ethnic data of individuals who have taken a civil service examination.
LawCode: Amd ยง7, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the creation of an annual report on the race and ethnic data of individuals who have taken a civil service examination
